game_description: Noun Town Language Learning will be available from the official Meta Quest Store from December 1st! Search for "Noun Town" in the Meta Quest Store search bar, or check out the new store page here: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5520452821357227/
review_1: Amazing concept but whenever I try to say words it never registers as being said yes my mic is on no matter how right the word I say is when it even is right I try French and basketball is the exact same word in English and after 7 tries it goes through when it’s said same exact way
review_2: I love this app so far! It’s a fun way to learn but I couldn’t figure out how to get pronunciations to play so it made getting the right pronunciation to move on hard. I also had a problem with how slow the thumbstick turning on smooth turning was. I have almost no nausea issues with turning in vr with thumbsticks but turning in game was unbearable. I play sitting down mainly so this makes playing the game difficult.
review_3: I tried the demo and it is fantastic. I can't wait for the whole thing to come out. It can be improved by letting the user slow down a word to hear it better.
review_4: Its pretty much an educational animal crossing in virtual reality! The devs have been nothing short of nice, and the comunity is great. Though i was promised a cat wich has yet to been added. Other than that 10/10
review_5: Really excited to see this game grow, VR language learning has a lot of potential. The vibe of the game is really fun and relaxing too!
